Package projectile

Class AluBat

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
projectile.AluBat
public class AluBat extends city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
Represents the main projectile of the boss class Alucard. Fires a bat object and manages the bat object's properties.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    AluBat(GameLevel level, Alucard alucard)
    Constructs a new AluBat projectile associated with the given Alucard boss.

      public AluBat(GameLevel level, Alucard alucard)
      Constructs a new AluBat projectile associated with the given Alucard boss.
      Parameters:
      level - The GameLevel in which the bat exists.
      alucard - The Alucard boss that spawned this bat.

      velocity - The velocity of the bat.
